trans-unit.source: Allows Visual Studio to communicate internally with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 允许 Visual Studio 与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 控件进行内部通信。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control is browsing a COM object and the user renames the object.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 控件正在浏览 COM 对象并且用户重命名该对象时发生。

trans-unit.source: Only a change of value of the property that corresponds to DISPID_Name for the COM object raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComponentModel.Com2Interop.IComPropertyBrowser.ComComponentNameChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 唯一值的对应于 DISPID_Name COM 对象的属性更改引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComponentModel.Com2Interop.IComPropertyBrowser.ComComponentNameChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Closes any open drop-down controls on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 关闭 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 控件上打开的所有下拉控件。

trans-unit.source: Commits all pending changes to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 提交所有挂起的对 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 控件的更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> successfully commits changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 成功提交更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Activates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control when the user chooses **Properties** for a control in Design view.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在“设计”视图中为控件选择“属性”时，激活 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control is currently setting one of the properties of its selected object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 控件当前是否正在设置其所选对象的某个属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control is currently setting one of the properties of its selected object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 控件当前正在设置其所选对象的其中一个属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The registry key that contains the user states.
trans-unit.target: 包含用户状态的注册表项。

trans-unit.source: Loads user states from the registry into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将用户状态从注册表加载到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.source: You can save some of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control states, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A> properties, to the registry and load them the next time the user runs your application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以保存某些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>控制状态，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A>属性，对注册表和它们的下一步时间用户运行你的应用程序的负载。

trans-unit.source: The registry key that contains the user states.
trans-unit.target: 包含用户状态的注册表项。

trans-unit.source: Saves user states from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 将用户状态从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 控件保存到注册表。

trans-unit.source: You can save some of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control states, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A> properties, to the registry and load them the next time the user runs your application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以保存某些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>控制状态，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A>属性，对注册表和它们的下一步时间用户运行你的应用程序的负载。
